overview:
Rajeev is a entrepreneur and most recently the founder and CEO of rajivweb.com.

He is keenly interested and professionally engaged in consulting companies and successfully helping them to make money since 2010. By applying his analysis of the client and their objectives, capabilities, and resources against the market they operate in their customers and their competitors he is been the recommended by many business worldwide.

He has worked with more then 200 clients from different niche and business so far and prominently increasing.

Since the time of consulting he founded two more advertising companies linkadv.com and actualtraffic.co.uk.

Today, Rajeev leads the development team @actualtraffic.co.uk, managing global operations, coordinating project teams and planning the vision for rajivweb.com future. His management skills have helped the company grow Year over Year, since it was founded in September 2008.

Arman holds degrees in Computer Science from Maharshi Dayanad University India.
